response.overview: Ariana is fresh out of college and looking for her first big internship. She’s got all the right qualifications and on paper looks like the perfect applicant. Unfortunately, Johnny is looking for a “special” kind of candidate—one who can handle everything he has to throw at her. After a little hesitation and consideration, Ariana makes it clear that she’s willing to do whatever it takes to land this job—even if it means taking Johnny’s huge dick in her tight little pussy.  Just when she thinks she’s a shoe in for the job, Ariana finds out that she might not be the perfect applicant after all. It seems the head honcho Jesse is giving the job to his niece. But, Ariana isn’t about to let a little nepotism stand in the way of her career goals, and she quickly turns the tables on Jesse. She won’t take no for an answer, and won’t let him hire a new employee before he’s seen ALL of her special skills.
response.title: The Perfect Applicant
